text: Hotopha Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to the Little Tallahatchie River. Hotopha is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "grasshopper". A variant transliteration is "Hotipka Creek" ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Panola County, Mississippi
title: Hotopha Creek
